work.description: Assiting Various projects utilizing ES6, PHP, PHPunit, Sass and WordPress.
highlights: Developing responsive web designs for client's companies by incorpating modern tools like: Webpack, Gulp, ESLint, Prettier, Woocommerce and others.
Learning to quickly adapt to new concepts and tools to become a more versatile asset.
Utilizing PHPunit to build data providers and test our functions where neccessary.

work.description: Contributes to student learning, growth, and advancement.
highlights: Listening and encouraging the student when he or she experiences concerns or struggles.
Facilitating problem solving while demonstrating how to use critical thinking skills.
Utilizing different teaching strategies depending upon the student.
